wikipedia_page.main: Ian Sagar (born 29 March 1982) is a British wheelchair basketball player. He was selected to play for Team GB in the 2012 Summer Paralympics in London. He has a broken spinal cord.

response: * Ian Sagar (born 1982), British wheelchair basketball player
